Class GamePane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • GamePane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GamePane
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.lang.Runnable
    Control ticks and actions performed each tick

                int startingCarnivores,

                int startMinSpeed,
                int startMaxSpeed,
                int startMinRad,
                int startMaxRad,
                int startMinEgg,
                int startMaxEgg,

                double startMaxEnergy,
                double startMinMetabolism,
                double startMaxMetabolism,
                double startMinFood,
                double startMaxFood,
                long chaseLength)
        GamePane constructor
        Parameters:
        width - width of drawRegion
        height - height of drawRegion
        startingCarnivores - amount of carnivores to start
        startingHerbivores - amount of herbivores to start
        startMinSpeed - minimum starting speed
        startMaxSpeed - maximum starting speed
        startMinRad - minimum starting radius of detection
        startMaxRad - maximum starting radius of detection
        startMinEgg - minimum starting amount of eggs
        startMaxEgg - maximum starting amount of eggs
        startMinEnergy - minimum starting amount of energy
        startMaxEnergy - maximum starting amount of energy
        startMinMetabolism - minimum starting metabolism speed
        startMaxMetabolism - maximum starting matabolism speed
        startMinFood - minimum amount of starting food
        startMaxFood - maximum amount of starting food
        chaseLength - chase length for all organisms
